alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:50AM CDT until August 07 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TIPTON AND NORTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 850 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Millington, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Millington, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Lakeland, Munford, Dixonville, Tipton, Atoka, Barretville, Griffin Corner, Quito, Woodstock, Redwood, Rosemark, Idaville, Locke, Sloanville, Brunswick, Wilkinsville and Gilestown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
